name: 王伯雅
objective: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
schedule:

Week 2 0225-0301	0228 & 0301 day off   
Week 3 0304-0308	Small talk
Week 4 0311-0315	Small talk
Week 5 0318-0322	Business talk
Week 6 0325-0329	Business talk
Week 7 0401-0405	0403-0405 day off
Week 0408-0412	Resume
Week 9 0415-0419	0416 Schoolwide Proficiency Test
Week 10 0422-0426	Using phones
Week 11 0429-0503	Using phones
Week 12 0506-0510	Social Occasions
Week 13 0513-0517	Social Occasions
Week 14 0520-0524	Report 
Week 15 0527-0531	Report
Week 16 0603-0607	0607 day off  Report
Week 17 0610-0614   	Final Exam
Week 18 0107-0111	Final exam & make-up tests
scorePolicy:
Class attendance and in-class participation (20%) 
	 Weekly homework, Quiz (25%) 
	 Presentation (40%): 
	 Textbook exam (15%)
